attributes.action: submit to a polygraph test over recent claims by clerical staff of the Prime Ministers Office over his bullying of them  which have been robustly denied by everybody except the employees who made the complaints.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unconchable that so many reports of bullying and reports of staff approaching anti-bullying charities can be merely rebuffed by allies of the prime minister and the prime minister himself.  It is IMPERATIVE that the people of this country know the truth over this matter and the ONLY way this is going to be arrived at is for the prime minister himself to submit to a polygraph, televised live, answering questions himself and put the results into the public domain IN REAL TIME, AS THEY ARE RECORDED.

rejection.details: Your petition should relate to government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
